author: robwaugh1974
title: Little girl grabs Popeâ€™s skullcap – and his reaction is (literally) divine
text:
(Picture: Twitter/ Julian5News) A little girl did what many toddlers might when the Pope bent down to give her a kiss on the cheek – she grabbed his skullcap right off his head.
Terror in London: One dead, police officer stabbed and many injured outside Parliament Pope Francis burst out laughing after the little girl grabbed his skullcap – known as a zucchetto.
Catholic blogger Mountain Butorac said, ‘I took them over there to hopefully get a good view of the pope, and she ended up taking the hat.
‘He came and gave her a kiss on the cheek, and she just grabbed it.’
Took my Goddaughter to meet the pope. She stole his hat! https://t.co/SdSorop3uN — 
Mountain Butorac (@MountainButorac) March 22, 2017 
More Theresa May bundled out of Commons by armed police after Parliament terror attack 
Witnesses describe 'man in black' attacking police officer outside Parliament 
Facebook activates Safety Check after Westminster Bridge attack leaves several injured
